charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1101_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a stroll
through the woods.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1101_0200_10:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] found a tiny mushroom on the ground and
reached down to pick it up!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_0300_10: HEY! What do you think you’re doing?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_0500_10:
Sorry for yelling at you! I sure jumped the gun
just now.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0401_0700_10: No, it’s OK! I’m really sorry for scaring you!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0302_0800_10: Should I leave the mushroom alone?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0402_0900_10: No, it’s OK! I’m really sorry for scaring you!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1000_10:
Actually, it’s OK to harvest mushrooms and other
mountain foods here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1100_10:
Of course, that doesn’t mean we can all just take
as much as we want.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1200_10:
As long as we leave enough for it to remain
sustainable—and we remember to say thanks—
it’s no problem at all!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1300_10:
I come here with Tsareena often to gather 
ingredients, too, in fact!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1400_10:
But some people just can’t seem to follow
the rules...
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0301_1500_10: Oh, so that’s why you were upset.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0302_1700_10:
Oh, so you were trying to keep
people in line.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_1900_10: Whoa! Tsareena, what’s up with you?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2000_10:
Aha! Heh, lookee here. I found me another
big mushroom!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2100_10:
There they are! Look, it was those guys over there,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2200_10:
They’re the ones who were breaking the rules and
taking way too much!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2300_10: HEY! What do you think you’re doing?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2400_10: What’s your problem? We need this for our plan!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2500_10:
We’re gonna use these to lure some Pokémon
away from their Trainers and snag them
for ourselves!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2600_10:
I won’t let you steal Pokémon or destroy the
nature here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2700_10: See if we care! Just try and stop us. We dare you!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_2800_10:
Fine! Let’s go, Tsareena! We’re gonna teach these
bad guys a lesson!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_3000_10:
I won’t let you ransack these woods anymore!
Cut it out, would you?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_3100_10:
OK, we get it already. We’ll stop!
Just don’t kick us anymore!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_3200_10:
Great job, Tsareena! Looks like we’re still the best
duo out here!
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1101_3300_10:
The two noticed Tsareena laughing boisterously
from the top of a boulder.
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_1301_3400_10:
Hahaha, look at Tsareena. She looks so vindictive!
She’s got a unique personality! Isn’t it great?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0401_3600_10:
A bit of spice just brings out the best in cooking
and Pokémon, don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0124_00_mao/2301_0402_3800_10:
A bit of spice just brings out the best in cooking
and Pokémon, don’t you think?
